results.overview: Sergiy and Katya will have to fight against the ferocious folklore evil spirits - the genetically modified Serpent Gorynych, a gang of brownies who terrorize people, and also repulse Viy himself, who is trying to take power into his own hands. They will continue their personal struggle: Katya will try to rid Sergius of very bad habits, and Sergius will try to melt Katya's heart.
results.title: Sergius Against Evil Spirits: Sabbath

results.overview: 1934. After the suppression of the uprising of the Schutzbund workers, engineer Hans Müller leaves Austria and emigrates to the USSR. In Russia Hans finds his love. His relationship with Galina is not simple. Her son Sanka agonizes over the arrival of a stranger in the house. But, in the end, Hans wins the boy's trust. When in Spain begins the Frankist rebellion, Hans voluntarily goes to fight in the ranks of the interbrigade. And after the liberation of Vienna, he returns to his homeland.
results.title: Они не пройдут

results.original_title: Carrossel 2: O Sumiço de Maria Joaquina
results.overview: The children are invited by a Brazilian music star to one of his shows. But the trip turns into a nightmare when the villains Gonzales and Gonzalito, recently released from prison, decide to kidnap Maria Joaquina.
results.title: Carrossel 2: O Sumiço de Maria Joaquina

results.overview: This film narrates the adventures of a handful of schoolchildren who, fed up with being mistreated by abusive fellow classmates, decide to form a secret group and plan small retaliations. Inspired by superhero movies, it touches on the subject of bullying, always with humor.
results.title: Zigortzaileak

results.overview: High school teacher En-Yu (played by Vera Yen) is invited by her longtime crush, Yue-Rong (played by Charles Tu), to attend a college friend’s engagement party. The gathering takes an unexpected turn when the group decides to play the forbidden supernatural game, *Hold My Hand*. What starts as a seemingly harmless after-dinner pastime soon turns deadly, as friends begin dying one after another. To their horror, they discover that once the game starts, it must be continued through a ritual of hand-holding, passing the curse onto the next person. Once someone clasps hands in the game, they cannot stop—the curse will follow them to the grave…
results.title: Hold My Hand

results.overview: The film takes place in a small southern town, the main problem of which is the lack of uninterrupted water supply. The young deputy chairman of the city executive committee proposes to speed up the construction of a water pipeline by passing it through the village of Shanghai, which was arbitrarily built up by people, thereby depriving hundreds of families of shelter...
results.title: Secret Graces

results.overview: When Jay and Annie first got together, their romantic connection was intense – but ten years and two kids later, the flame of their love needs a spark.  To kick things up a notch, they decide – why not? – to make a video of themselves trying out every position in The Joy of Sex in one marathon three-hour session.  It seems like a great idea – until they discover that their most private video is no longer private.  With their reputations on the line, they know they’re just one click away from being laid bare to the world... but as their race to reclaim their video leads to a night they'll never forget, they'll find that their video will expose even more than they bargained for.
results.title: Sex Tape

results.overview: A graduation ceremony in the country. One last evening before the future dawns. Ups and downs, escalations and reconciliations.
results.title: Into Troubled Waters

results.overview: Our days. Curious schoolboy Senka finds himself in a fairy-tale forest, hidden from human eyes by the spell of Yaga. To cast the spell again, Yaga goes to a modern city in search of a magical wonderful color. In the city, Koshchei, who remained alive after the battle with Ivan Tsarevich, has been waiting for a meeting with Yaga for a thousand years. Koschei is hiding in a dark dungeon and wants revenge, because it was Yaga who helped defeat him. There will be a new battle of good and evil. The winner will be the one who will be supported by the schoolboy Senka, who until the last did not believe that he was in a fairy tale.
results.title: Baba Yaga Saves The World

results.original_title: X-Rated: The Greatest Adult Movies of All Time
results.overview: The evolution of adult cinema through the most influential films in history, a journey that begins in the 1970s and ends nowadays. An in-depth analysis of the success of the most prestigious erotic films, their impact on industry and society, and their influence on cinema and contemporary culture.
results.title: X-Rated: The Greatest Adult Movies of All Time

results.overview: The parents of a talented 23-year-old pianist were killed in an accident on the way to her wedding to a career-oriented violinist. She tries to keep the family together and gets custody of her three underage siblings. Although her relationship breaks up and her job suffers considerably, the young woman remains in good spirits and manages to bring calm to the sometimes turbulent and problematic family life.
results.title: Wir bleiben zusammen

results.overview: The discovery of self-awareness in a twisting venture between dreams and reality. (The first piece of the director's Transformational Trilogy)
results.title: Sound of Sun

results.overview: The heroes of the film are scientists who endowed the girl with the ability to distribute Wi-Fi. However, no one is happy about this discovery: according to the terms of the state tender, they had to create a person who moves stones with the power of thought. Now they have two days to find a way out of this situation.
results.title: Distribution

results.overview: Magically able to hear what men are thinking, a sports agent uses her newfound ability to turn the tables on her overbearing male colleagues.
results.title: What Men Want

results.overview: In the pre-Civil War United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery. Facing cruelty as well as unexpected kindnesses Solomon struggles not only to stay alive, but to retain his dignity. In the twelfth year of his unforgettable odyssey, Solomon’s chance meeting with a Canadian abolitionist will forever alter his life.
results.title: 12 Years a Slave

results.overview: An ancient-Greece-obsessed American travels to the land of his ancestors to sell his old family homestead. However, plans go awry when he falls in love with a beautiful Greek woman; he changes course to salvage the village and change history.
results.title: A Spartan Dream

results.overview: Kordon tells the story of four ordinary women who, on the border with Ukraine in a station on the outskirts of a Zahony country that seems to stand still in time, do something extraordinary to help and give hope to a people under siege. A moving portrait of female resistance, courage and solidarity.
results.title: Kordon

results.overview: A TV movie by Kon Ichikawa, remaking of Ten Dark Women (1961)
results.title: Ten Dark Women

results.overview: Konstantin, a songwriter and master guitarist, runs away from numerous problems to the nature reserve Mikhailovskoye. Kostya has long lost any way of income and has almost given up hope to be heard, living by sheer inertia and often drawing on alcohol. His wife and daughter are going to Canada, and in his head he constantly turns around the question: what exactly has gone wrong? How can he put it right? Does anyone need his creative work at all, or has he just talked himself into that? Maybe Konstantin has enough energy to change things, but he strongly doubts that: indeed, why and for whom should he try. Nevertheless, the nature reserve is the right place to collect his thoughts, break the minefield of his own life into sections, and get to work.
results.title: Pushkin Hills

results.overview: When novelist Andrea Dewenter dies in a car accident, the lives of her husband Christian, grown-up son Lars, and adolescent daughter Elaine go off the rails. For all three, the few days between Andrea's sudden death and her funeral turn into an emotional roller coaster that eventually shows them the virtue of being a family.
results.title: A Family of Three

results.original_title: Сказка о купеческой дочери и таинственном цветке
results.overview: A girl tries to rescue her father from a mysterious curse by returning a scarlet flower to its rightful owner.
results.title: Scarlet Flower

results.overview: A television play based on the historical tragedy by Friedrich Schiller.
results.title: Don Carlos

results.overview: A major politician and businessman was killed. His widow, with the help of a private detective and a photojournalist, begins her own murder investigation. She learns not to trust anyone, especially her friends. The only one she trusted is a strange young man with paranormal abilities who promises to protect her and find the killer. Now Nelya is in real danger...

results.overview: Batmanova, once a serf, sets Paris aflame with her singing and now returns to the court of the Prince in 19th-century Russia. The Prince wants Batmanova for himself, but she loves a young nobleman who is technically still a serf because his papers have been lost.

results.overview: Ihor, is bored with his glamorous girlfriend Ilona. Meanwhile, Irina, demands sex of Andrew, for which he has neither strength nor desire. Ihor and Irina demand a sexual experiment - a swinger's party. Meanwhile, Sveta, left naked on her lover's balcony when his wife suddenly returns, is saved by Denis the neighbour. But the evening gets more interesting when Edward appears on Denis's doorstep.
results.title: Swingers

results.overview: Because they could no longer stand the xenophobic comments and behavior of their neighbors, Véronique and Sylvain Marchand, parents of a little girl and members of the Stop Racism organization, went into exile in a quiet suburban town, where they bought a house, the villa "Mon rêve". Soon after, the Dialo family, friendly Africans, moved into the adjoining house. At first, the two families get along perfectly. The only problem was that the Dialos organized many parties, which often ended late at night. The patience and understanding of the Marchands only delay the inevitable conflict.
results.title: Villa mon rêve

results.overview: The beginning of the 20th century. Famous singer Emilia Marty arrives on tour in a European city. At the same time, the Supreme Court intends to close the Gregor-Prus case, a lawsuit that lasted several decades. Albert Gregor unsuccessfully tries to seize the inheritance of Baron Joseph Prus, but cannot prove that he is his heir. Emilia Marty unexpectedly intervenes in the process, reporting the whereabouts of documents proving the family kinship of Albert Gregor and Prus.
results.title: Recipe of Her Youth

results.overview: Qi Xiaofu is an autistic child, and his parents' marriage will also come to an end. One day, Qi Xiaofu unexpectedly met a stray dog, a child from the stars and a stray dog with the same bumpy fate, from mutual fear and rejection to slowly approaching, until they were interdependent and inseparable. After being forced to separate, the stray dog searched everywhere in the vast city, and passed by Qi Xiaofu many times but failed to see each other. Qi Xiaofu's condition became more serious, and he was finally reunited after experiencing various hardships and dangers. However, there is a sad story behind the stray dogs.
results.title: Loyalty without words 2

results.overview: Qi Xiaofu is an autistic child, and his parents' marriage will also come to an end. One day, Qi Xiaofu unexpectedly met a stray dog, a child from the stars and a stray dog with the same bumpy fate, from mutual fear and rejection to slowly approaching, until they were interdependent and inseparable. After being forced to separate, the stray dog searched everywhere in the vast city, and passed by Qi Xiaofu many times but failed to see each other. Qi Xiaofu's condition became more serious, and he was finally reunited after experiencing various hardships and dangers. However, there is a sad story behind the stray dogs.
results.title: Loyalty without words 2

results.overview: Under unbearable pressure, a young tennis star summons a djinn who begins to prey on people in their sleep, threatening the lives of her loved ones.
results.title: Sleep Paralysis

results.overview: Clawdeen Wolf, half human and half werewolf, has recently started attending Monster High, a school for monsters in all forms. After quickly befriending her classmates Frankie Stein and Draculaura, Clawdeen feels like she has finally found a place where she can truly be herself, or so she thinks. Soon, a devious plan to destroy Monster High threatens to reveal her real identity and Clawdeen must learn to embrace her true monster heart before it's too late.
results.title: Monster High: The Movie

results.original_title: รักมันมหาศาล
results.overview: Sky, a mafia heir, and Sun, his strict bodyguard, fall in love, but must confront Sky's father and his expectations for their relationship.
results.title: Golden Blood: The Movie

results.overview: The characters we met a little more than a decade ago return to East Great Falls for their high school reunion. In one long-overdue weekend, they will discover what has changed, who hasn’t, and that time and distance can’t break the bonds of friendship.

results.overview: High school teacher Mary Stauffer and her eight-year old daughter, Beth are held captive for 53 days by an obsessed former student. Based on a true story.
results.title: Abducted: The Mary Stauffer Story

results.overview: Professor Ian Drummond, whose new invention was of interest to the Russians and Americans, is murdered at his Sunshine Menor mansion in full attendance. The writer Joe Alex, who arrived on the eve of the murder together with actress Sarah, and detective Ben Parker, before figuring out the true killer, will suspect in the crime each of those present, because each had a reason for it and there was evidence against each of them.
results.title: Murder at Sunshine-Manor

results.overview: When a popular doctor takes his own life, leaving behind a video will and a series of films of his life, everyone who knew him is forced to reassess their own life, creating a mirror of contemporary Syrian society.
